name: Sno Man's Land
description:
Years have passed since the world last saw Santa. The woes of children around the world and the chaos of man had warped the psyche of Jolly Saint Nick. The workshop closed, Christmas was put on hold in hopes that a vacation would rejuvenate the Spirit within, but there was nothing that could be done. With the last of his might Santa bequeathed onto his most loyal elf Alucard a hat filled with Christmas joy and was sealed away within his workshop by the elves and Mrs. Claus. Year by year the sweet whispers tempted the elves into rebelling and unleashing Santa onto the world once more in hope of bringing joy to the children unaware of the dread that would come. Now the elf must complete his final task and put Santa out of his misery once and for all, but the body of an elf is too weak. No, he needs something else, he needs to become someone else...

Developed by: Aiden James & Samith Shetti

Art by: Jacob Wieland and Adjartey Dorh
